Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Snowden could have raised all the issues he did as a whistleblower, without considering the limitations and consequences of such actions.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for why Snowden chose to reveal the information he did, instead of utilizing whistleblower protections.
